description: Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) and 3 (materials) of planning permission ref: 2024/01114/FUL granted 11th December 2024 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition following the demolition of existing conservatory and partial demolition of the ground floor back addition; excavation and enlargement of rear part of the existing basement; erection of bin/cycle store in the front garden; erection of timber gates to replace the existing gates at the side of the property including a canopy over part of the side passageway; removal of the front existing brick infill porch and reinstatement of the original front entrance; replacement of all existing single glazed timber framed windows with new double glazed timber framed windows' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include alterations and increasing the size of the basement extension and changing the materials of the ground floor extension finishes from timber cladding and rendered finish to traditional brickwork.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
